title: Chapter 5: Gazebo & Unity Simulation
description: Simulation is a crucial tool in robotics. It allows us to test and develop robot software without needing access to a physical robot, and it enables us to safely test our code in a wide variety of scenarios. In this chapter, we'll explore two of the most popular robotics simulators: Gazebo and Unity.
